how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content);Other
as you selected other: what are other pr: static html pages- For eg., collection of youtube videos
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, my TiddlyWiki is for personal use only
putting it all together, what value does: one of the most amazing pieces of swiss-knife multiple use softwares ever. Would like to use it like a local blog too, with grid settings, and with tags /categories lie wordpress, and some easier theming options or templates
what is your level of ability with tiddl: My use is basic; I use TiddlyWiki in a configuration close to standard, without plugins
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki through web browser with Download Saver (default saving mechanism)
how do you back up/sync changes between: Consumer online storage (e.g. Google Drive, Dropbox);DIY (any other solution)
as you selected diy, would be grateful f: keep copies in pen drive/or dropbox / or online storage
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: it is excellent already.! Learning about customizations, plugins, style sheets, or theme tweaking is not easy-many small videos required, and a forum for help
what could we do better? prompts for thi: no i wil not leave tiddlywiki, been 10 years with it. though would love to have better android usable app for it
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
